identity.name: Buse Kağıt
identity.archetype: The Performance Pro (Industrial Safety + Fintech Clarity)

headings.usage: All section titles, machine names, and key metrics.

mono.usage: Machine IDs, Order Codes, Barcode values.

colors.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Default for Operators (Eye strain reduction), Light Mode Toggle for Office.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 for dense grids, Gap-8 for layout sections.

grid_system.home: Bento Grid (1x4 or 2x2 depending on screen). Each module (Yönetim, Operatör, Plan, Depo) gets a massive card.
grid_system.dashboard: Dense Grid. 12-column system. Charts span 4-8 cols. Stats span 2-3 cols.
grid_system.operator: Touch-First Grid. Large buttons (min-height 64px). 2 columns max on mobile.

layout.container_style: Rounded-xl. 1px Border (Zinc-800). Subtle inner glow for active states.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast. Primary buttons use Safety Amber (#FFBF00) with Black text.

cards.style: Flat background (Zinc-900). 1px Border. No heavy drop shadows, use 'inner glow' or border highlight.
cards.interaction: Hover: Border color changes to Primary (#FFBF00).

inputs.style: Filled background (Zinc-950). Border-b-2 (Underline style) or Full Border. Large text size (16px) to prevent zoom on mobile.

tables.style: Compact. Zebra striping optional. Header uppercase + tracking-widest (Barlow Condensed).

motion.transitions: Spring physics (stiffness: 300, damping: 30). No linear easings.
motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down (0.95) on click. Cards lift on hover.
motion.page_transitions: Slide in from right for drill-down. Fade in for tabs.

universal_guidelines.design_philosophy: Avoid 'AI Slop'. No generic gradients. Use texture, noise, and precise borders.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid. Contrast ratio > 4.5:1.
universal_guidelines.code_style: Use Shadcn components but customize them via Tailwind classes. Do not use default Vercel look.
universal_guidelines.responsive: Mobile-first. Touch targets > 44px. No horizontal scroll on mobile.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to every button, input, and card.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'framer-motion' and 'lucide-react'. 2. Set up the Tailwind config with the custom colors. 3. Create the 'Layout' component with the industrial theme (Sidebar/Navbar). 4. Implement the 4 main modules as separate routes. 5. Use the provided images for section backgrounds with a dark overlay (bg-black/60) to ensure text readability.
